description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，毕业于六盘水师范学院，现任中国人民解放军南部战区副司令员兼南部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), graduated from Liupanshui Normal University, and currently serves as the Deputy Commander of the PLA Southern Theater Command and Commander of the Southern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国贵州省的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guizhou province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一种将官军衔等级。
description.en: A general officer rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于贵州省六盘水市的一所师范类高等院校。
description.en: A normal university located in Liupanshui, Guizhou.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区陆军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区的陆军组成部分。
description.en: The ground force component of the PLA Southern Theater Command.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的七个大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the People's Liberation Army, now defunct.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第13集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第13集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的集团军番号，原隶属于成都军区。
description.en: A former group army of the People's Liberation Army, previously under the Chengdu Military Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第14集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第14集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的集团军番号，原隶属于成都军区。
description.en: A former group army of the People's Liberation Army, previously under the Chengdu Military Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第73集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第73集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军，隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force, subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分，由中央军事委员会领导。
description.en: A component of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China, under the command of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，胡中强的前任，曾任中国人民解放军南部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and predecessor of Hu Zhongqiang, who served as the Commander of the PLA Southern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 胡中强是贵州六盘水人。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang is a native of Liupanshui, Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 1982年9月至1985年6月，胡中强在六盘水师范专科学校（今六盘水师范学院）生物专业学习。
description.en: From September 1982 to June 1985, Hu Zhongqiang studied Biology at Liupanshui Teachers College (now Liupanshui Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 胡中强是中共党员。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡中强拥有中国人民解放军中将军衔。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang holds the rank of Lieutenant General in the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 胡中强曾历任中国人民解放军成都军区445团团长、37师110团团长、37师参谋长、37师师长。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang successively served as Commander of the 445th Regiment, Commander of the 110th Regiment of the 37th Division, Chief of Staff of the 37th Division, and Commander of the 37th Division in the PLA Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第13集团军

description.zh-cn: 胡中强曾担任中国人民解放军第13集团军参谋长。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang served as the Chief of Staff of the PLA 13th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第14集团军

description.zh-cn: 2016年6月至2017年3月，胡中强担任中国人民解放军第14集团军军长。
description.en: From June 2016 to March 2017, Hu Zhongqiang served as the Commander of the PLA 14th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第73集团军

description.zh-cn: 2017年3月至2021年12月，胡中强担任中国人民解放军第73集团军军长。
description.en: From March 2017 to December 2021, Hu Zhongqiang served as the Commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 2021年12月至2023年，胡中强担任中国人民武装警察部队副司令员。
description.en: From December 2021 to 2023, Hu Zhongqiang served as the Deputy Commander of the People's Armed Police Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 自2023年5月起，胡中强担任中国人民解放军南部战区副司令员。
description.en: Since May 2023, Hu Zhongqiang has served as the Deputy Commander of the PLA Southern Theater Command.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 自2023年5月起，胡中强兼任中国人民解放军南部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: Since May 2023, Hu Zhongqiang has concurrently served as the Commander of the PLA Southern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军南部战区陆军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区陆军是南部战区的陆军组成部分，隶属于南部战区。
description.en: The Southern Theater Command Ground Force is the ground force component of the Southern Theater Command and is subordinate to it.

description.zh-cn: 胡中强接替张践，出任中国人民解放军南部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang succeeded Zhang Jian as the Commander of the PLA Southern Theater Command Ground Force.
